message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $120 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $85?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am unable to accept $85 for the product, but I am willing to meet in the middle at $97.50. I hope this proposal works for you.
